sentence.Network_en: The pretty girl smiled at Feathertop and love entered her heart.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个漂亮的女孩对着羽毛头微笑,而且爱情跑进了她的心里.

sentence.Network_en: And, going out from the house, Feathertop walked manfully towards town.
sentence.Network_cn: 于是羽毛头走出屋子, 气宇轩昂地往城里走.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Feathertop 羽毛头An Occurrence at Owl Creek Bridge 鹰河桥事件The Fortune Cookie Prophecy 幸运小甜饼里的预言The Day the Fire Came 火灾当天The Leap 跳跃.

means.word_mean: 1. northeastern tropical African plant having feathery panicles
